title: Zalando SE
description: Forecasting is at the core of our commercial operations. Forecasting tools help to determine how much of each product to buy, to recommend the best prices for these products, and to ensure that we have the right level of logistics capacity to fulfill customer demand. Forecast sales, demand, and return rates for our assortment.
